sense.def:
Kadar se nekaj zgodi
immediately
, se zgodi brez odloga.

seg.quote: I have to go to Brighton immediately. It's very urgent.

sense.def:
Z zrazom
immediately
tudi povemo, da se nekaj zgodi, kakor hitro se je zgodilo nekaj drugega.

seg.quote: Immediately I finish the show I get changed and go home.

sense.def:
Immediately
pomeni tudi naslednji v času ali položaju.

seg.quote: The church is immediately on your right.
The sequence of events immediately preceding the tragedy is uncertain.
